sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' export default class SquareProject extends Component { render () { const { index, project, showModalDelete } = this.props console.log(project) return (

{project.name}

{project.style}

Last update {new Date(project.updatedAt).toString()}

Created at {new Date(project.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}

) } } SquareProject.propTypes = { index: PropTypes.string, project: PropTypes.object, showModalDelete: PropTypes.func }
